title: ब्रिटिश लाइब्रेरी में मौजूद बाबरी मस्जिद की तस्वीरें? नहीं, ये तुर्की, अफगान की तस्वीरें हैं
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
Photos of Babri Masjid in India before independence.

 Photos are from the British library.

Such a beautiful Masjid demolished by Hindutva extremists. May Allah deal with them in the manner they deserve.
